alert.note: Alert for Esmeralda; Nye (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 30 at 6:06PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of south central Nevada, including the following counties, Esmeralda and Nye. * WHEN...Until 745 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 605 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Up to 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Beatty, Tonopah Test Range, Scottys Junction, Lida Junction, Gold Point and Goldfield. - Highway 95. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
